name: String Data
description: String data is left justified with leading and trailing spaces ignored. Leading and trailing spaces are not significant. A string may contain printable ASCII characters (codes 32-126) and certain control characters including tabs and carriage returns.

constraints.characters: ASCII printable characters (32-126) plus tabs and carriage returns

usage: Patient names, addresses, and other textual information
General text data throughout HL7 messages

generationHints.avoid: Special characters outside ASCII printable range
